ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Skyshrine and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: When Velious first came out - I got a lot of Guardian and some Sentry Armor. A good amount of the mobs were blue to me (I was 50 or 51 I think) - I think you
ygData.messageBody:
When Velious first came out - I got a lot of Guardian and some Sentry Armor.
A good amount of the mobs were blue to me (I was 50 or 51 I think) - I think
you can get SOME xp fighting Guardians and Sentries up to 52. You'll also
get some spell drops - and it's a great way to work on Kromref (sp?)
faction - to be able to bank and buy food in Kael.

I'm not sure what the minimum level to fight there would be - 41 may be a
tad low - I would expect by mid 40's you'd get great loot and items. But
you won't be able to take along anyone who wants Dragon faction

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 6:13 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Skyshrine and armor



Been grouping in Skyshrine with some higher level friends -- the dropped
armor there totally rocks -- and a full set of it will take your resists
right off the charts.

I know a 52 druid there soloing to twink his 23 warrior. Are any bards
doing this? If so, what level and what songs are you using?

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Bard of 41 songs
